---
id: get-nonce
title: "Retrieve the nonce for an address"
description: "The `nonce` endpoint retrieves the nonce for a given Mina address, taking into account the pending transactions."
sidebar_label: "Retrieve the nonce for an address"
hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true

custom_edit_url: null
---

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Retrieve the nonce for an address"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/info/nonce"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



The `nonce` endpoint retrieves the nonce for a given Mina address, taking into account the pending transactions.


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["address"],"properties":{"address":{"type":"string","description":"The Mina address for which to retrieve the nonce."}},"title":"NonceRequestParams"},"examples":{"getNonceRequest":{"summary":"Example of a nonce request","value":{"address":"B62qouKMtMcUxabk72vwZS7tY3XYEca1CPKgXPfznCHUiVjP9E6xxQz"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}

invalid input parameters.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"error":{"type":"string","description":"Error message detailing the issue."}},"title":"ErrorResponse"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized - something went wrong during the request.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"error":{"type":"string","description":"Error message detailing the issue."}},"title":"ErrorResponse"}}}},"503":{"description":"Service unavailable -
